meanings.definition: The act or process of translating words or text from one language into another.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed reading different translations of the same story.
meanings.sent2: The translations of the ancient text were accurate and easy to understand.
meanings.sent3: The translations of the menu made the restaurant seem like a whole new place.
meanings.sent4: His translations of emotions into music touched the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The translations of the poem brought out its beauty in a new light.

meanings.definition: A written or spoken rendering of the meaning of a word, speech, book, etc. in another language.
meanings.sent1: The translations of the novel captured the essence of the original work.
meanings.sent2: She relied on translations to understand the foreign film.
meanings.sent3: The translations of the play turned it into a hilarious comedy.
meanings.sent4: His translations of the speech resonated with the audience.
meanings.sent5: The translations of the recipe made it easy for everyone to follow.
